body:
I haven't done one of these in a while.
Ask me almost anything and I'll be as honest as I can.

Whether it's about the staff, the community, or anything controversial, I want to see how far I can go without getting told off xD

Ignoring 'Opinions on me' questions as always because as a collective I think you're all a bunch of knuckleheads.
body_tagged:

title: Honest AMA {SnowSX3}

replies.body: define knucklehead
replies.body_tagged: define knucklehead

replies.body:
What's it like being the only Kiwi mod?
Favourite Avi meme?
Rate me on a scale from 1 to 10? (trying to fine loopholes in the " no opinions on you" shit :P)
replies.body_tagged:
What's it like being the only Kiwi mod?
Favourite Avi meme?
Rate me on a scale from 1 to 10? (trying to fine loopholes in the " no opinions on you" shit :P)

replies.body:
It's fun being the only kiwi mod, the unique Timezone gives me a slightly different outlook on Moderating than others because I often find myself Moderating by myself for several hours before any other mods can come on.

Which is fine, but it's a mixture of awesomeness and stupidness that my Timezone is perfect for the 2-4am EST time slot. 
Its either hella quiet or completely full of hackers, there is no inbetween xD

Favourite Avi meme is Snowlas because I'm in it xD

You're a 10 because you're one of the better Moderators on the team. I can count on you time and time again and we always have each other's backs. You're also a stand up guy.
replies.body_tagged:

Its either hella quiet or completely full of hackers, there is no inbetween xD

Favourite Avi meme is Snowlas because I'm in it xD

You're a 10 because you're one of the better Moderators on the team. I can count on you time and time again and we always have each other's backs. You're also a stand up guy.

replies.body: Opinions on any attitude differences between the staff now and the staff a 2 - 3 years ago?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on any attitude differences between the staff now and the staff a 2 - 3 years ago?

replies.body:
I felt that the staff team of old knew what they were doing and had more of an idea overall of how to moderate.

Today's staff team are full of new people who have little moderation experience, so a lot of our Moderators today are still learning as they go.

But I say that with two different perspectives.

I viewed the old staff team as a baby-faced junior mod who didn't know anything.

I view today's staff team as someone who's done this three times already with almost 12 months of experience.

So that could have something to do with it.

The old staff team felt more like a family.

But this staff team feels like it's internal communication will get extremely better over the coming weeks and months.

We will see.
replies.body_tagged:

I view today's staff team as someone who's done this three times already with almost 12 months of experience.

So that could have something to do with it.

The old staff team felt more like a family.

But this staff team feels like it's internal communication will get extremely better over the coming weeks and months.

We will see.

replies.body:
How does it feel to know that you're country and your whole existence doesn't exist? For the unaware, New Zealand does NOT exist.
http://worldmapswithout.nz/
This website shows the global acceptance for New Zealand not existing. It's good we can now all move on with our lives.
If anyone is interested in supporting the cause for removing New Zealand off the map visit here
https://www.facebook.com/DoesNewZealandExist/

replies.body:
I privatise all of my evidence videos once I don't need them anymore.

Of the 100's of infractions I've dealt, only now has 1 infraction caused a problem.

I've privatised Lunacy's because his appeal is closed
and there's no reason for anyone to watch it apart from 'I'm curious' which isn't a valid reason to keep inactive evidence open in my opinion.

I may get shit for it, but until I get told by a Senior, the videos will stay private.
If you don't like it then tough.
I'm not involved in the appeal process anymore so I'm not keeping tabs on what's happening.
replies.body_tagged:

I'm not involved in the appeal process anymore so I'm not keeping tabs on what's happening.

replies.body:
I don't have anything to hide.
It's literally just 2 videos of suspicious movement that Para and I deemed impossible at the time.

As soon as the seniors took over lunacy's appeal a few weeks back with the hand cam and all that, my involvement with the appeal stopped there.

I'm not really sure why people keep roping me back into it.
I wasn't even involved in the final decision.

replies.body:
Favorite Avicus-
Admin: Posighdun
Senior Mod: Jozz
Mod: I have no idea haha a lot of people stand out for different reasons for me.
Junior Mod: Spart
Dev: Kash
Ref: Oscar
MapDev: Para
Offical: Nathy
Media: Shadow

Favorite Avicus update so far?
The one that changed the forums (Avicore?) dramatically was pretty neat.
This most recent one shows a lot of promise.
I'm terrible with names haha
What Avicus staff member do you look up to the most & why?
I've always looked up to Jozz.
His experience and Moderating approach is better than anyone else's on the staff team.
I always love working with him and I enjoy learning from him.

What type of music do you listen to?
A lot of Alternative music. 
Music that isn't entirely well-known or popular.
Bands like Six60 (they're well-known in New Zealand though) and alt-j

Rate me on a scale from 1 to 10? (I agree with Cammy)
Probably 10 haha. You're really chill and I enjoy Moderating and talking with you. You're a cool guy.

replies.body:
Trump being president scares me.
He clearly doesn't know what it takes to run a country for 4 years straight.

We were screwed either way with Clinton or Trump. Nobody trusts Clinton and Trump isn't fit to run a country. It will be interesting to see what happens over the next 4 years.

Worst thing about Avicus is probably the community's weirdly high interest in internal staff affairs.

A lot of people think they're entitled to know everything the staff do when in reality, they're not entitled to anything.
(when it comes to internal affairs)

It's called internal affairs for a reason.

Best thing about Avicus is the small community and how despite hundreds of 'this server will be dead till (random date here)' the server keeps going.

I lost count how many times the server was gonna 'die' in 2016..or 2015 now that I think of it.

I'm indifferent to it. It'll be nice to go there someday. I've heard good things about British chocolate haha
Favourite colour?
Green, maybe dark green.
Favourite animal?
Not a big animal person...guinea pig? 
Favourite game-mode?
Walls, every day of the week!
